website_summaries.verdict: The Audeara A-01 Bluetooth headphones feature noise cancellation and connect to an app that adjusts to your own personal hearing profile, but there are better-sounding options out there for the price.
pros: Adjustable audio based on in-app test that creates a personal hearing profile

customer_reviews.title: Audeara A-01 don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of the above purely on the basis of the app, on the first pair everything was fine they worked OK up to trying to use the app then everything went pear shaped, despite having assistance from Audeara, when i tried the app I kept getting told that the software was not compatible with software on the headphones. The second set of headphones paired OK because they told me they were on, but according to the app they were disconnected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over ear?
customer_reviews.text: They connect quickly with blue tooth and I don't disturb the neighbours late at night watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: GADGET MAN

customer_reviews.title: App is crap, fit too small.
customer_reviews.text: Hey, Audeara, maybe don't sell a product at a premium price, which requires an app to function, rated only 3 stars? Off the bat, the app asks for permissions like Contacts, Media, Location, which should be none of its business - and locks up if denied. Oh well. Returning. Btw, briefly tried them on - they are too small for my head, fully extended, which made my ears hurt after 2 minutes. Are they designed for babies?? Very awkward fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not fully functional without lengthy firmware updates
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to these phones based on all the positive reviews. Not one mention of lengthy firmware updates needed before you can even do the hearing test! Website says latest firmware update is v1.39, but the app wants to install v1.32 first. Only way to update is through the app - a mere 16 hrs on iOS! So two firmware updates totaling 32 hrs to install! Ridiculous! Very disappointed and let down by Audeara's lack of functionality right out of the box. Will be returning to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: W.J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: These work and sound great, the only problem I have with them is the size of the ear cups. My ears are pretty big so they get pressed against my head. I like the fact that you can tune them to how you hear. I've noticed I lost some hearing especially in the higher frequencies so it's nice to be able to listen to music and enjoy everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Deathkiss45

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality tailored to your hearing
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cool to not only get a hearing test but then get the sound modified to your hearing faults (if you have any in either ear) to provide a more realistic experience. this product is directed more for sound connoisseurs rather than those looking for heavy booming bass.
customer_reviews.author: Julie 432

customer_reviews.title: difficulty downloading software
customer_reviews.text: The soft ware required took 8-10 hours to down load. After two attempts that did not work. we returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: jwinni

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I wish the set up was a little easier. The update literally took 8 hours to do.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Huntington

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up , down load app and go . Great support.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Hagens

customer_reviews.title: It got emotional!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely open us a deeper clarity, unlocks a more evocative power than I am used to hearing. All the parts are clearer and way more identifiable, while none of the thunder gets lost. You can hear and feel so much more without having to add volume. It got emotional with some Hendrix
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Personalized sound quality !
customer_reviews.text: Never saw value in good headphones until I purchased the Audeara A-01. Ability to do sound test and personalize to my hearing changed the way I listen to music
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Clarity
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleasantly surprised how amazingly clear these headphones are. They really work as described. The diagnostics tool to help figure out the optimal sound is incredible. I am really hard of hearing and I can’t believe how much I have been missing out on.
customer_reviews.author: Gaspar and Josie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Custom Sound, But Bass Needs work
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are AWESOME. The only thing that I would suggest is a tweaking the options for settings, specifically for the bass. I prefer my sound on the 50% setting, but some songs just don't sound right without a little bit more bass. I would rather have these than Beats headphones any day!
customer_reviews.author: Mel O

customer_reviews.title: Very clear and understandable.
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with a hearing issue for about 10 years so when I discovered that these headphones were capable of tuning I thought I would give them a try. After basically giving up on clear and definable music I will say I was stunned at how I could hear all of the different instruments and how perfectly clear they all became. Thank you for making music a wonderful thing for me again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headset yet !!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is crisp and clean, amazingly clear! Everyone should own a pair Nilsa
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made a significant difference.
customer_reviews.text: My wife was able to notice a significant difference in music quality after taking the hearing test to adjust these headphones to her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just by a Bose
customer_reviews.text: If you are spending THIS much money on a headset, you might as well get BOSE and call it a day.
customer_reviews.author: Quincey

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: It took a lot of time to install the audeara app on my android phone. The Headphone quality is Good and I like the unique tone. Do not use this as an absolute default settings. You have to finish it.
customer_reviews.author: Javid hhipperfield

customer_reviews.title: Not just a headset, they're an investment piece
customer_reviews.text: Never experienced a headset like it, tailored exactly to your hearing needs. You will never have heard your favorite songs so purely. I've used these at home, travelling and even at work and they never fault. Battery power seems to be never ending and the accessories are good quality. Worth every hard earned penny.
customer_reviews.author: zak p-t

customer_reviews.title: And then we thought....
customer_reviews.text: ..... why not copy the concept and features of Nuraphones? So we did.
customer_reviews.author: The Stealer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These are some great headphones. The noise cancellation feature definitely works. I am a teacher and wore the headphones to listen to music on a school trip coach ride and couldn't hear the kids at all! Sound quality is good and they are comfy to wear although I haven't worn them for extended periods of time yet.
customer_reviews.author: 24_Laura

customer_reviews.title: The sound is really nice, hard to describe but the effect is much ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Kickstarter and it arrived 2 weeks ago after a bit of a wait. Had I known it was going to be on Amazon with next day delivery I would have waited! I ran the hearing test which was simple and took about 10 minutes. The sound is really nice, hard to describe but the effect is much greater after you have used these headphones for a few hours and then you try 'normal' headphones again. I can imagine the effect is even greater if you have damage to your hearing. Aside from the customised hearing function, the headphones feel great and sound very good. I would certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rock dj

product_meta.title: Audeara A-01 Bluetooth Wireless Over Ear Headphones with Personalised Sound, Foldable Design, Built-in Mic & 65 Hour Battery
product_meta.description:
"

* Winner of the Australian Good Design Awards 2018.

The Audeara A-01 over ear noise cancelling headphones with Bluetooth feature an innovative built-in hearing test that allows you to calibrate your headphones using an app, for the perfect sound, always. These wireless headphones have an incredible 65-hour battery life, so you won’t have to charge them every day. The active noise cancelling means you can turn it on when you want an immersive listening experience; or turn it off when you want to listen out for announcements, traffic or other outside sounds. 

HOW ARE THEY UNIQUE
Our innovative technology tests your hearing and personalises your favourite music perfectly for you, enhancing your experience through clarity, not volume. These Bluetooth over ear headphones have been designed by engineers and doctors to give you an experience like never before. 

HOW THEY WORK
Everyone has a degree of hearing loss. Every person hears differently, and every person hears differently in each ear. We tailor the sound for each person based on these two principles. The first time you use these headphones you perform a simple hearing test – the results of which are stored in the headphones themselves. They then use your hearing profile to adjust the sound signal as it passes through them. They adjust your right ear independently from your left, making sure you experience sound in perfect balance. Sometimes the change is enormous, other times it’s subtle, but it’s always there. 

COMFORT & STYLE
Built with an adjustable headband and soft over-ear cushion, the headphones also boast a rotatable design for easy storage in a slim, hard carry case when travelling. They’re stylish, comfortable and feature a built-in mic for hands free calling. 

ABOUT AUDEARA 
Audeara believe music is one of life’s greatest gifts. A gift that should be cherished. We believe we have created a platform that brings you a listening experience like never before. If you love music, choose headphones that love you back. 


"

BOX CONTAINS
Headphones
3.5mm Cable
Carabineer
Carry Case
Micro USB charging cable
Headphone case
Quarter inch jack
feature_bullets: AUDEARA EXPERIENCE – Everyone hears differently. The Audeara A-01 over ear wireless headphones have a built-in hearing test allowing you to calibrate them to your specific hearing profile. Plus, you can store multiple profiles so you can share your headphones and still enjoy perfect, personalised sound

ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION – Your headphones, your choice. Switch noise cancelling on when you want to be fully immersed in sound, or off when you want to listen out for ambient sounds – control this feature easily with a button on the ear cup
65 HOUR BATTERY LIFE – The 1000mAh battery offers up to 35 hours of listening to Bluetooth audio with noise cancelling activated, or up to 65 hours without noise cancelling

BUILT-IN MICROPHONE & BLUETOOTH – The built-in mic and clear voice capture technology lets you make crystal clear calls on the go. Bluetooth 4.2 ensures your headphones will be compatible with your devices for years to come – all the more reason to invest in the perfect listening experience. Operation range- ≤10m

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
